reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Differentiated HIV Services for Key Populations in Malaysia

description.narrative: Malaysia - HIV - Malaysian AIDS Council - MAC. This program has the following goals: To transition the Community Case Management Model to domestic funding with a view adoption as the national mechanism for delivery of HIV services among KP. To strengthen the capacity of civil society organistions and community-based organisations in HIV response towards achieving the 90-90-90 targets by 2020 and ending AIDS by 2030. The objectives of this program are: To increase the rate of uptake of HIV testing among key populations. To increase the rate of case finding among key populations. To increase enrolment in ART among PLHIV from key populations. To increase rate of ART adherence among key populations living with HIV

Coverage / Output indicator for MYS-H-MAC
TCS-Other1: Percentage of newly diagnosed key populations (MSM, TGSW, FSW) enrolled on ART (individual linkage)
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of condoms distributed to sex workers (disaggregated by distributed to female, male and Mak Nyah sex workers) (Phase II Objective 2.3)
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
TCS-other 2 : Percentage of sex workers (female and male) living with HIV and on ART who have a supressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
TCS-other 4 : Percentage of PWID living with HIV and on ART who have a supressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
TCS-other 1 : Percentage of MSM living with HIV and on ART who have a supressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
TCS-other 3 : Percentage of TG sex workers living with HIV and on ART who have a supressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number and percentage of sex workers reached (disaggregated by female and male) (Phase 11 Objective 2.1)
